translation.welcome: Share Your Resort Experience With Us
translation.subtitle: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. Your feedback helps us improve our services.
translation.simpleQuestionsDesc: Easy to answer multiple choice questions
translation.quickCompletionDesc: Takes only 5 minutes of your time
translation.valuableImpactDesc: Your feedback directly influences our improvements
translation.question: Question
translation.testimonialDisclaimer: By submitting this form, you agree that your feedback may be used, in whole or in part, as a testimonial on Aria website. We may edit your comments for clarity, grammar, or length without changing the intended meaning. Unless you request anonymity, your first name and general location (e.g., city or state) may be shown.
translation.testimonialConsentAgree: I agree to the user of my feedback as testimonial under the terms stated above.
translation.testimonialConsentAnonymous: I prefer my feedback to remain anonymous.
translation.thankYouComment: We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts with us. Your feedback helps us improve our services.
translation.formSubmittedText: You have already completed this feedback form. Thank you for your response!
